casebody.data:
Paul SOMERS, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
DIGITAL REALTY TRUST INC., a Maryland corporation; Ellen Jacobs, Defendants-Appellants. No. 15-17352 United States Court of Appeals, Ninth Circuit. Filed April 11, 2018

ORDER

The judgment of the District Court is reversed and the case is remanded for proceedings consistent with the opinion of the United States Supreme Court in Digital Realty Tr., Inc. v. Somers , --- U.S. ----, 138 S.Ct. 767 , 200 L.Ed.2d 15 (2018).
